recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta with rich meat sauce. Cook pasta. In a pan, cook beef with onions and garlic. Add tomato sauce and herbs. Simmer. Serve sauce over pasta.
recipes.ingredients: Spaghetti, ground beef, tomato sauce, onions, garlic, olive oil, herbs
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta. In a pan, cook beef with onions and garlic. Add tomato sauce and herbs. Simmer. Serve sauce over pasta. Cook pasta. In a pan, cook beef with onions and garlic. Add tomato sauce and herbs. Simmer. Serve sauce over pasta.
